channel.title: Blogs on Decarbone
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Decarbone

item.title: The advantages of the conversion
item.description: You are interested in the conversion but you want a better vision on why should you ?

item.title: EV batteries are getting cleaner and cleaner: 2-3 times better than 2 years ago
item.description: Such an awesome news coming from T&E. The carbon footprint of the most common type of battery for electric cars are 2 to 3 times lower than the estimation of the same researchers back in 2017.

item.title: Is the conversion legal?
item.description: Car conversions are still new for European countries compared to the United States where it is widespread since 10 years.

item.title: An alternative solution for the climate ambitions
item.description: In 2019, global warming and its consequences on our environment are on the front page of all the newspapers: there is an emergency.
